knimeNode.name: FeatureCountsMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: The FeatureCountsMerger can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs.

fullDescription.intro:
The FeatureCountsMerger can be used to merge the results of multiple feature count runs.
The node takes as input a list of feature count files and returns a table with the merged counts.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set the path to the folder where the merged file should be stored.

Remove the path of the file in the header: Choose whether to only take the name of the file as header caption.
Remove the ending of the file in the header: Choose whether to remove the ending of the file in the header caption.

ports.inPort: Paths to FeatureCountFiles are expected to be in the first column.
